## PluginRegistry.findReportersForFormat() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Find reporters that produce a specific output format.

**Signature:**

```typescript
findReportersForFormat(format: string): ReadonlyArray<ResolvedCapability<ReporterDefinition>>;
```

format


</td><td>

</td><td>

Output format ('text', 'markdown', 'json', 'html', 'custom')


</td></tr>
